website_summaries.verdict: Suitable as a powdered mineral foundation if you need light to medium coverage, or to use for touch-ups throughout the day. However, it's not the best pick to wear by itself if you need full, lasting coverage.
pros: Absorbs oil like traditional pressed powder, and can be worn separately or over other foundations and concealers
Some users like to apply it as a contour powder
Contains vitamins and goes on smoothly
cons: Coverage isn't enough for consumers with a lot of skin imperfections, and tends to look dry or "chalky" on some complexions

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the coverage this pressed version provides
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in "LightNatural". I have been using bareMinerals "fairly medium" or "medium". Chose LightNatural in this format and they seem to be the same to me in terms of color/shade. I am very happy with the coverage this pressed version provides. I don't use the usual kabuki brush. I apply it with an angled bareMinerals Precision Face brush and it does a great job in hiding all the imperfections no matter how big they may be. It's also buildable and doesn't cake. I find myself using this more than the loose minerals I've been using for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppaholic

customer_reviews.title: Incredible for Acne-Prone Skin!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use BareMinerals loose mineral powder, but it landed in all the cracks and crevices and made me look older than I am. I'm 54, but still have oily, acne-prone skin. With a good foundation brush, this goes on smooth, is buildable, and the coverage is amazing. I will definitely keep buying this product! I think it's actually making my skin healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie Hailand

customer_reviews.title: Breathable/Buildable
customer_reviews.text: I went into Sephora to find my shade. (NUTMEG) It is sold at Sephora for $31. I prefer powder over liquid because it lets my skin breath and this powder feels like nothings even on my skin. Also It’s a buildable coverage. No shine or glow to this foundation,it definitely leans towards a matte finish. I like a matte finish with a sheen blush for a more natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: BEST FOUNDATION EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ridiculously sensitive skin, and because of that, I never wear liquid foundation. For years I wore Philosophy Air Brush powder foundation and loved it! When they discontinued it, I cried a little. I've spent the past two years looking for anything that even came close, with no luck! UNTIL NOW!! I think I even like this BareMinerals BarePro better than Philosophy! With this foundation, a little goes a LONG way. And the coverage is unbeatable!! This stuff is smear proof, sweat proof, and just flawless! It stays on all day no matter what. I will definitely be re-ordering! This Irish girl with blotchy skin is happy happy happy!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J Cargill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful make up
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and it keeps my skin from breaking out
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Meauhead

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Really like the bare pro foundation much better than the Ready. Looked much better on my 60 some skin. However the color I ordered was too light for me and I went on the chart that was given. Therefore the 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyday

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL BUYING ON AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money and buy from the store!! I have ordered this product a few times from Amazon over the years and never had an issue. But this last order, I’m almost positive it is fake. I’ve used and loved this product for 4 years and could tell the difference immediately when I opened it. It has an extremely strong smell, almost like baby powder, and the coverage is very very light, when the REAL product is close to full coverage. The actual barepro is amazing, and has worked perfect for my very sensitive skin. But buyer beware if you’re purchasing on amazon, I believe they’re sending out a fake product.
customer_reviews.author: ShayV

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: I am a stage performer that needs coverage that will stay for hours and hours and hours. This is my go-to foundation for that. I've never found anything better that isn't oily pancake makeup. This type of bare minerals doesn't breathe as well as the regular powder but I buy this for a specific purpose. Also, with the powder I need to buy multiple shades and blend, but this one is exactly my skin tone! I will buy this over and over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Moj

customer_reviews.title: Displayed colors way off
customer_reviews.text: Product display powder color is way off. I ordered Carmel ‘ See side by side (left is product display & to the right is what I received! not even close
customer_reviews.author: Cee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Use FAST & Out The Door!
customer_reviews.text: Just received and tried. I ordered the Concealer also but am returning as ordered it 1st then saw creme powder. All I wanted was something to put on FAST and out the door and this is it. Covers sun spots with two quick wipes and is such a quality creme powder it looks very natural. I am a medium-tan white woman so ordered the Silk as per another review. It's ok for now but may get a shade darker as I get darker during summer.
customer_reviews.author: Museical27

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal Bare Minerals customer for years, but the loose powder always gets everywhere, especially when I'm doing my makeup on the go. This compact gives me the same great coverage without the mess!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Want to Look Younger?
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my face glow and look younger. You use a little at a time so it goes a long way. People do not even know I am wearing make and tell me how lovely I look. I like it because it isn't thick and give a very natural look on the face. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Best Bare minerals product I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Flawless coverage. Great for any skin tone. Started with loose powder many, many years ago. Won't go back to that. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Roataneaña for life

customer_reviews.title: Know your shade first!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Bareminerals foundation!! This is by far my favorite because it provides full coverage without being too heavy. Love being able to bring it with me anywhere as well. But be aware - the pictures on here are not all the correct shade of the foundation!! Go to Bareminerals website first, find your shade, then compare the names back to here. I bought silk and it’s definitely not the dark shade that shows on the front picture. It’s more for light skin.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Covers wrinkles and looks natural. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love the covering effect and it is so natural looking. I am 70 yrs old and hate having a photo taken due to wrinkles. On occasion I take a selfie and delete it because I hate the wrinkles. I look 75% better with the Bare Minerals on my face. I am a convert. It doesn't feel heavy and I don't look made up. I bought warm natural and it is a nice look for a medium fair complexion.
customer_reviews.author: laurel

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this foundation! I was skeptical of using a powder foundation because I'm 44 and I worried that it would settle into fine lines, but that is certainly not the case. It matches my skin tone perfectly and stays on all day. But my favorite thing about this foundation is how much time it saves me in the morning. Seriously, just a few swipes of this on my face, a little blush and some mascara and I'm done!
customer_reviews.author: Kelbell

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: this is awful. Not at all what I expected from bare minerals. This is nothing like the original bare minerals. Horrible coverage. Its just not a well made product and I love bare minerals! I just dont like this product whatsoever. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Duplessis

customer_reviews.title: Not Bare Minerals
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage, I've thrown it out already. I will not be purchasing this brand from Amazon anymore.
customer_reviews.author: TCP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful makeup!
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup! Covers blemishes and other imperfections well, without looking fake or powdery. Blends in nicely and works well with other Bare Minerals products. Ive also used over foundation to seal it . Gives a nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: grammy

customer_reviews.title: Bare minerals is great but stick with the liquid.
customer_reviews.text: I love the bare minerals product and wanted something for a quick on the go foundation. If you are used to liquid you will not like this. Additionally it is much much lighter than their Fair 01 liquid foundation. It makes me look extremely pale (and I’m super pale already). It doesn’t have a lot of coverage and comes off easily. I still think it is a good product but unless you are used to this type I wouldn’t recommend it. The liquid is much better and still just as light of a product.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan L.

customer_reviews.title: Great oil control!
customer_reviews.text: This is was the first time I tried Bare Minerals powder and this was the best one I’ve tried compared to Lancôme and lower priced ones. Usually by mid-day my face would become so oily and the oils would get into my eyes with other powders. When I used Bare Minerals my face remained oil-free all day. I will definitely buy this powder again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure about ordering the correct shade so I went on the bareMinerals website and found my shade. Perfect match. Love this lightweight powdered foundation. Goes on smooth and feels like nothing on my skin, I love it! I use a powder puff to apply. I also like that this foundation is unscented. I’m 57 years old and it doesn’t settle in my fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take the product out of box and inspect before storing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered warm natural to replace my what I thought soon ending warm natural and just went to use it and it was too light, low and behold the sticker on the box with Barcode says warm natural but the actual product is dawn 02 .... make sure to check your products closely!! I'm out of the window for returns bc I had it in my make up counter due to it being summer and not wearing it as often My other one lastep longer the expected and here we are.....
customer_reviews.author: Prime

customer_reviews.title: USED powder received
customer_reviews.text: I get this powder cause it is the only one I can find to match my skin. Why I received a used mineral powder, I cannot say. But I’m not happy. The powder is clearly already used. Not something you’d want especially with spending so much money.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t order YELLOW powder, that’s what I got. Now I can’t return it
customer_reviews.text: I’m so upset with this company. Color said honey, when I gifted it to my Mom today, the powder is yellowing, it’s NOT the color I saw on the photo. I’m now stuck w/ 4 of these wrong, mis- advertised powders. I go to return them today and I read the window to return has closed. Will NEVER order from this company again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels great. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite foundation. Goes on so easily, nice coverage, yet feels like I'm not wearing makeup. It honestly makes my skin look like a better version of my skin. I use daily and this one compact lasts for months. I do recommend getting one of their better face brushes made for applying foundation. It makes a world of difference.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is amazing for my middle aged acne prone oily skin. After using my non-comedogenic mattifying primer & Dermablend liquid foundation, I set it with this majestic product. It's so light and blendable that it provides me with a natural look. Then, BOOM! I'm ready to SLAY that day.
customer_reviews.author: Del B.

customer_reviews.title: Good...but,
customer_reviews.text: It's good but I've had better powders that are softer and milled more finely. It looks good but I prefer to use as fast bushing powder on top of liquid foundation or bb creams rather than by itself. It's bare minerals so ingredients should be cleaner than most.
customer_reviews.author: riki k

customer_reviews.title: L O V E
customer_reviews.text: This powder foundation is a MUST for me. I have combination and acne prone skin and I love this foundation! I have always been a liquid foundation girl until I tried my moms BarePro powder foundation and I must say I am hooked! Its so easy to apply and go. I apply a regular matte primer in my T-Zone and then conceal any blemishes and dark circles with my Tarte ShapeTape concealer and then I apply this and it hides everything!! Will be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm allergic to a lot and my skin is very sensitive, so it may work for you.
customer_reviews.text: I was using Merle Norman but there are no studios nearby. I had heard good things about this. It could just be my skin. However, this shows every imperfection on my face and I had dry patches after using it. It had a nice color and powder finish. It might work for you. I am a fair redhead.
customer_reviews.author: papertiger79

customer_reviews.title: Best powder foundation ever!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had this in a different shade. I tried it and loved the look and how smoothly it went on, so I found a shade better suited to me and ordered it. They now have a new customer because before this runs out I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: karla

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: Wow....this is one of my favorite new finds. I’ve always used Bareminerals powders, but this really is the best one yet. The coverage is amazing. It’s “buildable”, yet sheer and light. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: jackie turcotte

customer_reviews.title: There is Talc
customer_reviews.text: If I did more research I wouldn’t have purchased this. It’s becoming annoying when cosmetic lines are not straight non comedogenic throughout. If they sell 5 things Talc free I can’t assume everything they produce is also.
customer_reviews.author: LilDeer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for easy application
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation! I was looking for something really easy to slap on in the mornings as I get my kids ready and leave for work. This was exactly what I needed. I have combination skin so I use a moisture stick over the dry areas before applying and then put it on with a brush instead of the compact blotter. It stay on all day, doesn’t dry out or make my skin oily. Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: aheb

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan. It sits really weird on the skin and is very drying even though I have oily skin. The color was super pink and didn’t cover anything and I don’t have much to cover. Also it broke me out, which other bare mineral’s products never do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT LONGWEAR. ONLY LIGHT COVERAGE! NOT WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! This was light coverage that wasn’t even worth it. No different than just putting on powder. You have to use SOOOOO MUCH product in order to build up any coverage at all, at which point wrinkles are accentuated. I don’t know how they can say this is long wear. After a couple of hours, it settled into my lines and pores and looked like a mess. Returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Kay

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopeful I would like this but it makes my pores stand out. I’ve used BE mineral veil and matte foundation for years and like it but have to reapply too often - and the loose powder can be VERY messy. The search is still on for a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy666

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother ordering this product.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't last and if you have dry skin it sticks to those areas and looks horrible. Even if you have combination skin beware because those dry patches will stand out as scaly skin. Very unnatural looking. Don't waist your money. The only good thing I can say is it is the exact color match for me.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D Hudgens

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I love putting it on my face much better than liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Martie

customer_reviews.title: Light & Good Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Bare Minerals before, several years ago. I’m afraid I went on to other brands for a while, but I’ve come back. This foundation gives me light, even coverage, and a natural look. No heavy foundation for me. I don’t apply powder over it often. I find I like the look with just the foundation application. A very good product.
customer_reviews.author: LMH1917

customer_reviews.title: Been verified
customer_reviews.text: There's ABSOLUTELY no other brand than this! Its right shade for each foundation no matter what. Liquid, pressed powder, and loose too! I have very sensitive skin and red understones that used to drive me CrAzY! But NOT ANYMORE! I've used several of bare minerals since 2006 and there's no other brand in my present nor FUTURE. And it's AFFORDABLE!
customer_reviews.author: Kara McKee Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Better coverage than I expected from powder foundation. Lasts all day long!
customer_reviews.author: wife of a cheater

customer_reviews.title: Love Bareminerals!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite foundation! It gives you just the right amount of coverage and looks completely natural. I love the convenience of the compact which I can easily slide into my purse. Just wish they would use the same cosmetic puff that they put in the Mineral Veil compact into the Barepro compact. It's a better applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It matches my skin perfectly. Looks natural and my skin feels soft, not dry like how other powders make my skin feel. Very nice. Better than mac, my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie2106

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I like this foundation. It's a powder but it doesn't look like powder on. The warm natural I chose matches my skin tone perfectly and I don't feel like I'm wearing any makeup, which I like, though it evens out skin blotchiness very well. The brush that you can buy separately I highly recommend and it really helps in the blending process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I have Lupus and flair frequently. This product is more than expected in concealing scars and discoloration from autoimmune disorders. Thank you so much for helping me see beyond the crap people bully me for. I'm getting more confident. Sounds silly but when people only look at flaws, they don't see the person I am.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.Kaczmarek

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Usually I bought the foundation powder (warm neutral 12) at major department store, but it was cheaper here. I was a bit turned off by some reviews that the foundation was missing from the case but I went ahead and purchased. Arrived in new packaging. I tossed my old compact and started using this new one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E

customer_reviews.title: Matches my weird skin tone
customer_reviews.text: I have a weird and difficult to match skin tone, I’m very fair skinned but yellow not pink or peach undertone, this is the only company that I can use that matches me without having to mix it with something else first so it will match. Great coverage. I’ve bought the same product directly from bare minerals website so I’m sure it’s authentic. It does settle in the creases a bit though.
customer_reviews.author: JBElle

customer_reviews.title: Bare Minerals is a Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love Bare Minerals makeup. It has good natural coverage and feels great on my skin and it’s healthier for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: love bare minerals
customer_reviews.text: great quality! cheaper on here than where i initially purchased at ulta, i went there to get color matched. now i can get it cheaper here! same product, better price
customer_reviews.author: amanda cole

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup on the planet
customer_reviews.text: Light to medium coverage. Unlike most of their products which are powder based, this is more like a compact powder version. Great for travel and it tends to give you a lot more product than their loose powders. Love it. Comes with a sponge for fast and easy application.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what I needed, fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Less expensive than I could have ordered at other department or beauty retailers, and delivery was super fast! No breakage or anything -- absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: LvilleAndrea

customer_reviews.title: This powder foundation stays in place all day. No reapplying
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Bare minerals products for years. Barepro is my favorite powder. It's easy to apply and stays on all day. I never have to reapply. Also the shade I chose is a perfect match for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsure if true bare minerals
customer_reviews.text: I got It and It has brown not make up spots in It. I’m not sure if this is true bare minerals. I believe It made me break out because I have Been on bare minerals for 10 years and all the sudden I have Bad breakouts. I may Be wrong but found It odd.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: They need to switch back to the READY foundation.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had the Ready compact before and went to order more and it was discontinued so I tried this which was supposed to replace it and I hate it. It doesn't cover well, match well, or wear well. I have used Bare Minerals for years and have never been disappointed until I got this and it's terrible. If you haven't tried this, don't you won't be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jantzen

customer_reviews.title: I love the coverage of this product
customer_reviews.text: For normal days this product only needs to be applied once. If you have an extremely active day, you may need a touch up. I love the coverage of this product. I have very sensitive skin and have never had any issues with the foundation. I went to a Bare Minerals store to match up my skin tone with the correct color. If you are switching from the Loose Mineral Foundation Power to the Compact, you will want to do the same. The color chart for the two product lines are different.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Greene

customer_reviews.title: Oily skin? Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: If you have oily skin, proceed with caution. This powder went streaky after only a few hours. Even blotting sheets couldn't keep it from separating and sliding around on my skin. Drugstore powders work better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory (Literberry)

customer_reviews.title: I like how it feels when applied
customer_reviews.text: I like how it feels when applied. I think next time I will just get a shade "warmer". It was just a tad too light but I can still use it.
customer_reviews.author: ARico

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it’s good as long as you wear it on top of a color correcttor.
customer_reviews.author: Edi

customer_reviews.title: Love this powder!
customer_reviews.text: I really like Bare Minerals but the loose powder is messy and takes a long time to apply. I love this pressed compact for it's finish and easy to pack. I can use it with foundation for a good coverage or just alone for light daytime coverage.
customer_reviews.author: B. Yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly the quality of the ones i buy in store. Perfect. Great coverage. I have mild acne and this is able to cover those spots. But you can also wear it lightly if your skin is clear and you just want coverage.
customer_reviews.author: garys*gal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great for me, especially in the summer when it’s hot. Good coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Blanche Young

customer_reviews.title: Such a good product
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Bare Minerals products, but this format for the powder was new to me. It works great, and lasts a couple of months if worn lightly. I love that it has helped me skin breathe, and less breakouts too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I like this for hot sweaty summers. It gives medium coverage. Lasts whole day without needing touch-up. Comes off easy at the end of the day. Since its a compact, easy to carry around with you. Would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nakstrani

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bare minerals loose powder in medium in the winter and medium beige in the summer for over 10 years. I love this product even more than the loose powder. I ordered natural warm, and it matches beautifully, I also ordered sandstone for the winter months and both colors are very beautiful. I live in south Alabama and have a sun exposed complexion. Really amazing coverage better than the loose powder I would say. Great product well packaged and quick delivery!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Gaubatz

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday wear.
customer_reviews.text: Great powder foundation. It’s not heavy and gives a natural look to your skin. Stays on all day. This is my everyday powder. I use a liquid for special occasions and nights out but it’s is a great daily one! Skin doesn’t breakout with this.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this product but I really liked it. It was cheaper than at Ulta. The coverage is perfect. I recommend this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: lkap

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I like the lightweight and even coverage of this product. I do not like the mask-like coverage of most foundations. This evens everything out without turning you into a "cake face". It is not a full coverage, hide everything, make-up. It is a natural look that feels nice.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi K.

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage but still very light in texture. The coverage lasts all day for me. I have somewhat oily spots so I do have to touch up occasionally if I don’t want a lot of shine. I have been using this product for years. It’s never irritated my skin. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Anissia Rick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used liquid foundation for years because I could never find a good powder that provides really good coverage. I purchased this based on the good reviews and was not disappointed. I was shocked at the amazing coverage this powder provides! I generally reapply about halfway through the day but I do that with every makeup brand I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee W.

customer_reviews.title: I love this quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this powder compact from bareMinerals. All I need is a kabuki brush and the bare minerals in my face looks flawless. Very lightweight comfortable natural looking. Good quality makeup for the money I would recommend again
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This can be applied with a brush or powder poof that it comes with. Stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina A. Garo

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Mac Studio Fix Powder, bit am switching to all cruelty free products. This is sooooo much better than Studio Fix!! Great coverage and does not look caked on. I am a convert!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Controulis

customer_reviews.title: Natural look and feel but provides good coverage as well
customer_reviews.text: I’m 64 years old and was looking for something that would provide coverage yet look natural. And I was tired of liquid make up. So I tried this. I was surprised at how natural it looks and feels and how well it covers. I apply with a large brush and can layer it as well. Stays looking good all day.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love saving money and I bought this on a whim before we went on vacation. Got it in perfect condition wrapped up nicely so it was protected. Arrived super quick. I couldn’t be happier. It’s a perfect color match and super easy to take on vacation. Will buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jrivera

customer_reviews.title: Fair is Actually Fair!
customer_reviews.text: It's one of the few brands that are actually light enough to match my very fair skin, and I've never had an allergic reaction to it. The original non-pressed foundation in fair was always way too dark for my skin, but this is truly fair!
customer_reviews.author: A. Schockman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the simple application process! Great color match! No breakouts from it!
customer_reviews.author: brad clark

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I use bare mineral everyday. Other retail stores increased the price about $10 than previous years so I decided to order on Amazon, which was cheaper. It is the same product. I am happy with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L

customer_reviews.title: Smooth coverage
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it smooths out my complexion so I don’t need liquid foundation most of the time. And I’m 71, so not everything works this well at making me presentable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda BF

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic foundation with all day wear
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Bare Minerals fan for years and have always love the original powder foundation. I decided to try this compact style and really love it! It is everything you would expect from Bare Minerals with good coverage, all day wear, feels light and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Leigh Baird

customer_reviews.title: What I want
customer_reviews.text: full coverage for my hormonal acne dark spots which is what I want the most. I think my skin can breath more with powder foundation than my other liquid foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Xtia

customer_reviews.title: New to makeup, but very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very new to makeup and have had a lot of help from my sister in choosing brands and shades, but overall I have been very happy with the bareMinerals Barepro Performance Wear Powder. I am still new to makeup and don't have a lot of experience with other products, but what I have used so far of this product I have been very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Farm Chick

customer_reviews.title: Good for yellow undertones
customer_reviews.text: I need makeup with NO pink, I have yellow undertones and aside from Lancome Matte Honey this is the only brand I've found with an understanding of this tone. My lancome lasted about 8 months, this is a more shallow so I have to buy it twice a year as opposed to 8 months, but I prefer this shade so no problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: MaryBerry

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Perfectly match the skin tone and invisible on the face. Lays evenly and smoothly. Does not leave a “mask” effect on the face. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alena Sawi

customer_reviews.title: Not a full coverage powder foundation at all
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product being a full coverage powder foundation and it was horrible. I primed my skin as I always do and put this on and it looked like it brought out every pore I have on my face. Not an even or natural look at all. Will be sticking with my Clinique until I find something more long wear and has better coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ehrenberg

customer_reviews.title: Best Foundation out there!
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation! I have no plans to ever switch back to liquid foundations. It last all day with very little if any retouch. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for my usual powder foundation, but ran across this one and decided to give it a try. After trying it, I have decided that I like it more than the bareMineral loose powder foundation I used to use. Perfect texture and cover-up.
customer_reviews.author: Letty Colon

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Makeup Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear bare escentuals ready foundation. Bare minerals is no longer making it. Barepro is even better than ever!!!! Super quick and easy to apply. Full coverage yet super light weight. I couldn't be happier!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chi Town

customer_reviews.title: Used 😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed on this product. I order this compac every couple months and when I opened this it was used, the songs was used and the compac has an indent in it. I can't send back due to I am completely out of makeup and Amazon is backed up do to corona virus.
customer_reviews.author: melissa carrera

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup
customer_reviews.text: It does not dry out your skin, matches your skin color and is soft not bulky on your face and lasts all day if your not touching your face a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up, this is NOT the real one you’d buy from Sephora. It’s OK but does NOT cover as well or as smooth.
customer_reviews.author: karen bush

customer_reviews.title: No coverage, Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this compact if you are expecting the same coverage from their loose powders. Either I got a bad batch or the product itself is not impressive. Either or, I will give it a thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: Guv'nor the English Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even feel like I’m wearing anything. Light weight and last all day
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Graverson

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this makeup on QVC and I loved it. They no longer carry it and I found it cheaper here anyways! It’s the exact same makeup. I love the way it makes my skin look and it feels like I’m wearing no makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I love Bare Minerals. I have been wearing for a long time. I did pick a shade lighter by mistake but that is ok. I have the loss power as well to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Tranfers
customer_reviews.text: It looks pretty, but it comes off which is one of my biggest pet peeve’s! I look down and it’s on my shirt, on a paper I touched. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whole I love Bare Minerals and will always use it this particular ...
customer_reviews.text: Whole I love Bare Minerals and will always use it this particular foundation doesn't cover the minimal redness I have so I use a slight application of the original powder foundation over it
customer_reviews.author: Over 60

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Honestly so glad I stopped buying Lorac just because this powder is equally great but half the price. Worth it. And actually it might even be a little better than Lorac.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Scott

customer_reviews.title: I do not reccomend.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the way it Cakes on, I used it before work and regretted it. Shows all the fine lines. Really expected more with the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Not a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be better for the price. I would rather stick to my Tarte products for this price and get the coverage I need.
customer_reviews.author: abi

product_meta.title: bareMinerals pro Performance Wear Powder Foundation, Silk, 0.34 Ounce (I0085691)
product_meta.description: Color:SilkThis powdered foundation offers medium to full coverage with a naturally matte finish. Its micro fresh formula features 30 true to you shades that stays put for up to twelve hours and doesnt clog the pores or cause breakouts.
feature_bullets: Offers medium to full coverage with a naturally matte finish
Doesn’t clog the pores or cause breakouts
Country of origin is United States
